Flash.esp32: --chip esp32 --port [port] --baud 921600 --after hard_reset write_flash -z --flash_mode dio --flash_freq 40m --flash_size detect 0x1000 esp32/bootloader.bin 0x8000 esp32/partitions_espruino.bin  0x10000 esp32/espruino_esp32.bin
Flash.esp32c3: --chip esp32c3 --port [port] --baud 921600 --after hard_reset write_flash -z --flash_mode dio --flash_freq 40m --flash_size detect 0x1000 esp32/bootloader.bin 0x8000 esp32/partitions_espruino.bin  0x10000 esp32/espruino_esp32.bin
